app_descript:
App Name: Livemoji

Package Name: com.allmakebesttapp.animoji

Brief: Ready to elevate your emoji game? Livemoji is here to animate your chats and social media! This fun and innovative app allows you to utilize a diverse array of 3D animal avatars and celebrity faces to create personalized, animated expressions. No longer bound by the limitations of conventional emojis, you can now share a truer representation of your emotions with family and friends across various messaging platforms.
